item.description:
I have been in discussions with a national company with corporate headquarters in the Boston area.
They've asked me to put together a group of 8-10 baby boomers for a meeting. They'd like to ask us our opinion about social activities, events, and on-line communities that we like - both physical and on-line groups. A light dinner is included.


This is a unique opportunity to help shape future events and to see how a major marketing company provides services. The Boston location will be given to the attendees.

You must have a photo posted to attend - there is a meetup fee of $2 to offset my costs.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: National Marketing Company -Conversation with Boston area Baby Boomers
